ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kunark songs and stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe, yeah, I posted that.  Charmed a 51 gullerback when I was level 51 still.  Couple days ago. Elwyn ... From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@pge.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
hehe, yeah, I posted that. Charmed a 51 gullerback when I was level 51
still. Couple days ago.


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 03, 2000 11:26 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Kunark songs and stuff


I have heard rumors that Bravura does NOT cap 49 but caps at the Bard's
level. On the Concert Hall someone posted they charmed a level 51
Gullerback last night.... I will try and confirm this tonight.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:garramone@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 03, 2000 8:21 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Kunark songs and stuff
>
>
> Level 51 songs...song of travel is nice until you kill your
> friends with it
> hehe (i haven't yet, but i did get scared when i broke
> through the clouds
> and was 2000 feet above Karnor's), and i do use the new
> largo's over chains
> since it does not get resisted as much as i expected.
>
> Level 52 song... worthless. it drops when you get hit due to
> the absorb
> damage aspect.
>
> Level 53 songs...worthelss. Song of Dawn seems to do nothing, Song of
> Twilight is an upgrade to pixie's and therefore works just as
> poorly. I had
> huge hopes for this one, eqcasters listed it as a stun, not a mes.
>
> Level 54 song...worthless. 45% haste means nothing when any
> haste item+any
> haste spell/song gives you max haste. even anthem is better
> than this. was
> hoping that since the haste cap was raised above 75% (i think
> it can get as
> high as 100% now and is based on level and class, ranger i
> was fighting with
> was at 90% at level 53) it would mean something.
>
> Level 55 song...nice, but reaffirms us as mana pumps, and i'm
> gonna hate
> having to switch to lute between every fight to get the max
> potential from
> this (ok so i am lazy, my fingers hurt after weaving songs
> for 12 hours in
> upper bugs for 1.5 bubbles).
>
> Level 56 songs...both geared for running away from bad
> situations, dunno how
> useful they will be.
>
> Level 57 song...worhtless, when was the last time you used denon's
> dissension?
>
> Level 58 songs...one nice there is nothing wrong with an AC
> increase, can
> weave it with Vov, the other is the same useless piece of
> crap the level 45
> song is.
>
> Level 59 song...is this a joke? yes the real reason i have
> for getting to
> level 50 is so i can charisma buff my entire party! woohoo!
>
> Level 60 songs...both look awesome at first glance, hopefully
> make it worth
> the frustration of getting to 60.
>
> Level 39 song...soon worthless as we start fighting mobs
> above level 49, but
> i use the hell out of it now.
>
> btw Parry caps at 75. guess we can assume riposte does also,
> i was hoping
> more along 125 but better than nothing i guess, though
> doesn't seem to work
> much at that cap.
>
> ok these thoughts just came from conversations with the level
> 54 bard in my
> guild. i am trying not to get depressed. someone cheer me
> up, please!
>
> Shada Powa, L52 Wood Elf Minstrel
> Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
>
